item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us for a day on the water either Sailing  (assuming there is wnd) or Snorkeling. There is some great snorkiling places on Merrymeeting Lake. We will snorkel a sunken boat in about seven to ten feet of water!

Come join us for a potluck lunch on  the water,

We will take the pontoon party boat out and have a potluck on the lake, so no electric pots, keep it simple!

If  you come please know that we will be either sailing or snorkeling or doing both, weather premiting! So please bring appropriate mask, snorkel, flippers, etc.

Bring a kayak or motor boat if you have one!

If you get lost my telephone number is: 603-312-6735

See  you there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Sailing or Snorkeling Day
